desc: We’re a small business consultancy based in Poole Dorset, working with ‘solo-preneurs’ and SMEs in the Dorset and Hampshire areas.We have a proven product and marketing process, which works very well in a face to face environment, such as business networking meetings. We’re looking for an individual who can represent us at these meetings, engage with other attendees, and tell them about what we do, with the goal of inviting them to attend one of our free ‘tasters’.As well as the face to face representation there may be further follow up involved by phone or email after the initial discussion (Note, no cold calling is required though!).We provide a great product that genuinely helps people, and they always enjoy attending the tasters. So in many ways it’s an easy ‘sell’; the challenge is being able to initially identify suitable targets (i.e. business owners) and strike up that initial rapport such that the invitation to the taster event is natural and welcomed (we don’t hard sell or hound people!)So we’re looking for an individual with the following qualities:-	Good interpersonal skills, able to communicate, engage, and create a good impression.-	Able to converse with business owners at different levels of seniority (i.e. from new business to well-established).-	Doesn’t need to be an expert in business consulting, but will need sufficient awareness and knowledge of the business arena to be able to talk credibly with the business owners.-	Must be able to travel by own means to business and networking events in Dorset or Hampshire (ideally both). Note that these events can be early morning or late in the day, so must be able to work flexibly to suit the scheduling of the available events.Proposals welcomed from serious applicants who have read the above spec. We'd envisage trialling the arrangement for an initial period of 1 to 3 months. If successful the work could be an ongoing requirement.
title: Business Development / Representation at Networking Events (UK Dorset/Hampshire)

desc: REQUIREMENTS:1. Experience in E-Marketing in Shipping Industry (UAE experience is an advantage).2. Candidate should be at least graduate and have certifications in E-Marketing.3. New ideas and ways of marketing and we required creativity.4. Attractive salary will be offered as per the experience and candidate with new ideas and creativity. (Experience in shipping industry would be preferable).JOB DESCRIPTION:1. Plan and execute all web, SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaign[url removed, login to view] and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs.3. Identify trends and insights, and optimize spending and performance based on the insights4. Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience5. Devising strategies to drive online traffic & generate leads to the company website6. Tracking conversion rates and making improvements to the website.7. Developing and managing digital marketing campaigns8. Planning & Overseeing the social media strategy for the company9. Managing online brand and product campaigns to raise brand awareness.10. Evaluating customer research, market conditions, and competitor data.11. Review new technologies and keep the company at the forefront of developments in digital marketing.
title: Social Media Marketing

Portfolio of recent samples of email content that you have produced (particularly for training, education, teaching or learning services)?2.	A summary of how you would approach this assignment to deliver creative and high quality content that will engage the reader to register for our training courses?3.	An undertaking that you will hold all information provided in strictconfidence and not use this project as sample work?4.
